name: A black leather battlesuit called 'protector'
data: It increases the users strength ILLEGALLY.
It increases the users dexterity ILLEGALLY.
It decreases the users wisdom a tiny
It decreases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has nice armour class for its type (superb in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'dodge'.
